Workflow.Name: Employee Awards and Recognition - Deactivate Program
Workflow.Description:
This workflow will create an instance for every Period, to run every Period End Date so it can deactivate the Program.
Every Period End Date, it will run and it will check: If the Program is active, it will set the "Awards And Recognition Setting" record "Program Status" field to "No".

LocalizedName.description: Employee Awards and Recognition - Deactivate Program
